location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham, Council at Bussora (Basra) from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has a hole in its text.

mods.abstract: Letter reports the arrival of the [Futee Eloy?] Captain John Attenborough and the departure of Admiral Pocock. Shipped by the [Futee Eloy?] .
